snippet: The all-American cornerback Jalen Ramsey said he was leaving Florida State after his junior season. California receiver Kenny Lawler will also skip his senior year.
abstract: All-American cornerback Jalen Ramsey says he will forego his junior season at Florida State and enter NFL draft; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The all-American cornerback Jalen Ramsey said he was leaving Florida State after his junior season. California receiver Kenny Lawler will also skip his senior year.

headline.main: Cornerback and Receiver to Turn Pro
headline.print_headline: Cornerback and Receiver to Turn Pro
